info.author: Brian C. Christensen
info.description:
Project scheduling software. Use it to define tasks, assign resources, calculate dates, and create 
gantt charts. GanttPV is a scriptable (using Python), cross platform (written in wxPython it can be 
run on Mac OS X, Linux, and Windows), open source, easy-to-install, desktop software package.
info.keywords: project management, schedule, gantt, gant, gantt chart, bar chart, task, critical path
info.name: GanttPV
info.summary: Creates project schedules & gantt charts, scriptable, cross-platform, open source
info.html_description: Project scheduling software. Use it to define tasks, assign resources, calculate dates, and create gantt charts. GanttPV is a scriptable (using Python), cross platform (written in wxPython it can be run on Mac OS X, Linux, and Windows), open source, easy-to-install, desktop software package.
